## Description {#details}

An RAII helper object ensure that the unique lock file is removed.

Ensures that if there is an error or a signal before we finish acquiring the lock, the unique file will be removed. And if we successfully take the lock, the signal handler is left in place so that signals while the lock is held will remove the unique lock file. The caller should ensure there is a matching call to <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a7936dae925973eb8b0921c01b70b16d8">sys::DontRemoveFileOnSignal</a> when the lock is released.

Definition at line 136 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lockfilemanager-cpp">LockFileManager.cpp</a>.
